alert.note: Alert for Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 4:33PM CST until February 26 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 433 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tyrone, or 11 miles southwest of Liberal, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Liberal around 445 PM CST. Hayne around 450 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kismet. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
